import os
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

source.6c21f551:
import tensorflow as tf
try:
    tpu = tf.distribute.cluster_resolver.TPUClusterResolver()
    print('Device:', tpu.master())
    tf.config.experimental_connect_to_cluster(tpu)
    tf.tpu.experimental.initialize_tpu_system(tpu)
    strategy = tf.distribute.experimental.TPUStrategy(tpu)
except:
    strategy = tf.distribute.get_strategy()
print('Number of replicas:', strategy.num_replicas_in_sync)
source.5f1e2b36:
fig, ax = plt.subplots(30,4,figsize=(15,60))
for i in tqdm(range(120)):
    r=i//4
    c=i%4
    sns.histplot(train[train.claim==0][cols[i]], label=cols[i]+' claim=0', ax=ax[r,c], color='black',bins=20)
    sns.histplot(train[train.claim==1][cols[i]], label=cols[i]+' claim=1', ax=ax[r,c], color='C1',bins=20)
    ax[r,c].legend()
    ax[r,c].grid()
plt.show()

fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(4,2))
sns.histplot(train[train.claim==0]['f1'], label='f1 claim=0', ax=ax, color='black',bins=20)
sns.histplot(train[train.claim==1]['f1'], label='f1 claim=1', ax=ax, color='C1',bins=20)
ax.legend()
ax.grid()
